decision_conditions: work in accordance with British Standard
description: 1 x London plane (38): One limb of 20-25mm diameter projecting to north east over playing field  - remove.1 x London plane (34): One limb of approximately 25 mm diameter projecting south west towards Bloomburg Street -  reduce to a point just above the cavity. 1 x London plane (47): One limb of 20-25mm diameter at approximately 6m above ground level projecting south  - remove .1 x London plane (54): One limb of 20-25mm diameter at approximately 6m above ground level projecting south east over playing field - reduce branch end by approximately 7m .1 x London plane (64):   One limb of 20-25mm diameter at approximately 8m above ground level projecting north east over road  -  reduce branch end by approximately 8m to junction with previous pruning wound.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
